mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Trade (id, registrant_id, acc_id, target_acc_id, branch_id, trade_date, amount, balance, trade_type, status, cash_indicator, description, trade_number, registration_date, version) VALUES (trade_seq.nextval, #{registrantId}, #{accId}, #{targetAccId}, #{branchId}, #{tradeDate}, #{amount}, #{balance}, #{tradeType}, #{status}, #{cashIndicator}, #{description}, #{tradeNumber}, #{registrationDate}, #{version})
mapper.update: UPDATE Account SET balance = #{balance}, modification_date = #{tradeDate}, modifier_id = #{registrantId}, version = version + 1 WHERE id = #{accId}
mapper.select: SELECT t.id, t.registrant_id, t.acc_id, t.target_acc_id, t.branch_id, t.trade_date, t.amount, t.balance, t.trade_type, t.status, t.cash_indicator, t.description, t.trade_number, t.registration_date, t.modification_date, t.modifier_id, t.version, acc_customer.name AS customerName, target_customer.name AS targetCustomerName FROM Trade t JOIN Account acc ON t.acc_id = acc.id JOIN Customer acc_customer ON acc.customer_id = acc_customer.id LEFT JOIN Account target_acc ON t.target_acc_id = target_acc.id LEFT JOIN Customer target_customer ON target_acc.customer_id = target_customer.id WHERE t.trade_number = #{tradeNumber}
